Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to the membership of the board of directors of the Catskill regional off-track betting corporation
Summary: Relates to the membership of the board of directors of the Catskill regional off-track betting corporation.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the membership of the board of directors of the Catskill regional off-track betting corporation
